plot: Shot over 6 years, Yumyum is the story of a gang of street youth from Kenema, Sierra Leone. Yumyum is leader and had his own video camera. He was expected to sell it but he went on to shoot 100 hours of footage- candid, brutal, poignant.
title: Yumyum
plot_es: Shot over 6 years, Yumyum is the story of a gang of street youth from Kenema, Sierra Leone. Yumyum is leader and had his own video camera. He was expected to sell it but he went on to shoot 100 hours of footage- candid, brutal, poignant.
